# The `MCObjectWriter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Defines the object file and target independent interfaces used by the assembler backend to write native file format object files. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCObjectWriter</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Defines the object file and target independent interfaces used by the assembler backend to write native file format object files.

The object writer contains a few callbacks used by the assembler to allow the object writer to modify the assembler data structures at appropriate points. Once assembly is complete, the object writer is given the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> instance, which contains all the symbol and section data which should be emitted as part of <a href="#ab1d5b19bf0e12d0f42b937d7e534b797">writeObject()</a>.

Definition at line 33 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h">MCObjectWriter.h</a>.

### emitAddrsigSection {#a76a0c2751af2844b3c14f41955b6d731}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::MCObjectWriter::emitAddrsigSection ()"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Tell the object writer to emit an address-significance table during <a href="#ab1d5b19bf0e12d0f42b937d7e534b797">writeObject()</a>.

If this function is not called, all symbols are treated as address-significant.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h/#l00107">107</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h">MCObjectWriter.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### executePostLayoutBinding {#a5fd56e75c2099d48aaf2909705765ac9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::MCObjectWriter::executePostLayoutBinding (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Perform any late binding of symbols (for example, to assign symbol indices for use when generating relocations).

This routine is called by the assembler after layout and relaxation is complete.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h">MCObjectWriter.h</a>.

### isSymbolRefDifferenceFullyResolved {#ac824d3ba330c71dc80aeea123922f11d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MCObjectWriter::isSymbolRefDifferenceFullyResolved (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42; A, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42; B, bool InSet) const</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether the difference (A - B) between two symbol references is fully resolved.

Clients are not required to answer precisely and may conservatively return false, even when a difference is fully resolved.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h/#l00085">85</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h">MCObjectWriter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcobjectwriter-cpp/#l00030">30</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcobjectwriter-cpp">MCObjectWriter.cpp</a>.

### recordRelocation {#ac50b0371115af97e5155bd535f285dd7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::MCObjectWriter::recordRelocation (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment">MCFragment</a> &#42; Fragment, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &amp; Fixup, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> Target, uint64&#95;t &amp; FixedValue)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> a relocation entry.

This routine is called by the assembler after layout and relaxation, and post layout binding. The implementation is responsible for storing information about the relocation so that it can be emitted during <a href="#ab1d5b19bf0e12d0f42b937d7e534b797">writeObject()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h/#l00076">76</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h">MCObjectWriter.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### writeObject {#ab1d5b19bf0e12d0f42b937d7e534b797}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual uint64&#95;t llvm::MCObjectWriter::writeObject (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm)</>}>
Write the object file and returns the number of bytes written.

This routine is called by the assembler after layout and relaxation is complete, fixups have been evaluated and applied, and relocations generated.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h/#l00127">127</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcobjectwriter-h">MCObjectWriter.h</a>.
